cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Natural Resources on July 14, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 972, Wildlife Refuge Conservation and Recreation for the Community Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 26 (Thursday, February 11, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. CALVERT:
H.R. 972.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article IV, Section 3, Clause 2 of the U. S. Constitution.
[Page H502]

latestAction.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 216.

title: Wildlife Refuge Conservation and Recreation for the Community Act
